metadata.title: CVE-2023-52747 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:IB/hfi1: Restore allocated resources on failed copyout Fix a resource leakif an error occurs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52747` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-2.16').
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-211.222~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1004.9').
linux-aws package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1001.10').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1156.169~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1165.180~16.04.1').
linux-gcp package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1150.166~16.04.1').
linux-oracle package in xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1119.130~16.04.1').
